name: HH_VO_DEFICIENCY
description: This table contains the deficiencies associated with the home care order.

columns.name: VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the verbal order.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DFI_ID
columns.description: The deficency ID associated with the home care order.
